doc.field: 5 binders: 1) "Battalion 4": Memos and other items distributed to Bat 4 (some specific to them, some general FDNY matters), 1996-99 (Spadafora is identified as Battalion Chief of #4 on a 1998 memo). 2) Various blank reporting forms, procedures, notices, late 1990s-circa 2000. 3) Labeled "Division 11" (Spadafora is Deputy Chief) includes blank reporting forms, lists of fire units in the city, FDNY telephone directory, and some procedures, circa 2000. 4) Also labeled "Division 11" includes memos and such for D11 (and D6 also), with some incident planning and exercises, late 1990s with some earlier and some to 2005. 5) Another labeled "Battalion 4" also with memos, etc as with binder 1. Folder labeled "Division 14" with various incident action plans (e.g. US Open 2008) and drills (e.g. NY and Atlantic RR disaster drill, 2003; Fort Totten drill, 2001), Management Appraisal, Reviews and Comparisons (MARC), for D14, 2001. NYFD Forcible Entry Guide, 2010.
